articles.author: Jacob Steinberg
articles.title: Chelsea lose Christopher Nkunku to injury in pre-season draw with Dortmund - The Guardian
articles.description: Chelsea almost stumbled for the first time under Mauricio Pochettino before summoning the resolve to emerge from pre-season unbeaten
articles.content: On a cabbage patch of a pitch, Chelsea lost Christopher Nkunku to injury and almost stumbled for the first time under Mauricio Pochettino before summoning the resolve to emerge from pre-season unbeat… [+10783 chars]
